message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this incredible product. It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to acquire something truly unique. I'm willing to sell it to you for $900000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to you.
Thanks for the offer, Alice.  $900000 is a good starting point, but I'm looking to spend closer to $800000.  If you're open to that range, we can work out a deal. Let me know what you think.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your target price is $800000, but I'm still looking to get closer to the product's true value. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $850000. This is a fair compromise, considering the product's worth to you.
